name: Axis Mundi Game: TA Version
description:
Axis Mundi is a web-browser game containing artifacts of various Indonesian ethnic groups in the form of gijinka. Player act as "Sang Juru"–sent after The Great War which destroy humanity–who wander down to "Axis Mundi" (earth pillars) to restore balance to the world. "Sang Juru" can raise "Caraka" (tribal embodiment) from the artifacts that left behind, and take them to fight corrupted creatures.

Axis Mundi Game © Anita Kartini (design) & Hilman Munadi (art)
With help from Gumi Bersaudara (fundraisers), Gilbert Reeves (coding), Hans Yudhistira (wiki admin), [...]
